funding-group.funding-statement: VM is a Fellow of the Parmenides Center for the Conceptual Foundations of Science ( http://www.parmenides-foundation.org/). This work was partly supported by the EU ERC COLLMOT project (grant No. 227878, erc.europa.eu/). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
